meanings.meaning_en_US: Having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar or honey; not salty, sour, or bitter.

examples.sentence: The cake was so [sweet] that I could only eat a little.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那蛋糕太甜了，我只能吃一點。

examples.sentence: She has a [sweet] smile that brightens the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有一個甜美的微笑，可以照亮整個房間。

examples.sentence: I prefer [sweet] fruits like strawberries and mangoes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我偏愛像草莓和芒果這樣的甜水果。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, used for working at.

examples.sentence: He sat down at his [desk] to start working.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他坐在他的書桌前開始工作。

examples.sentence: The [desk] was cluttered with papers and books.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 書桌上堆滿了文件和書籍。

examples.sentence: She organized her [desk] neatly before the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議前，她把書桌整理得整整齊齊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large, heavy motor vehicle for transporting goods.

examples.sentence: The truck delivered goods to the store.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 卡車將貨物送到商店

examples.sentence: He drives a truck for his job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他開卡車作為工作

examples.sentence: The truck was loaded with supplies for the charity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 卡車載滿了慈善活動的物資

meanings.meaning_en_US: To carry or support the weight of something.

examples.sentence: He could not [bear] the pain any longer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他再也無法忍受這種疼痛。

examples.sentence: She [bore] the responsibility of the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她承擔了這個項目的責任。

examples.sentence: They will have to [bear] the costs of the repairs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將不得不承擔維修費用。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large, heavy mammal that has a shaggy coat and a short tail.

examples.sentence: The [bear] wandered through the forest searching for food.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這隻熊在森林中遊蕩，尋找食物。

examples.sentence: In many cultures, the [bear] is seen as a symbol of strength.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在許多文化中，熊被視為力量的象徵。

examples.sentence: They saw a [bear] by the river while hiking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在徒步旅行時，在河邊看到了熊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A day or period of celebration, typically for religious reasons.

examples.sentence: The music [festival] attracted many visitors.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 音樂節吸引了許多遊客

examples.sentence: They celebrated the harvest [festival] every year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們每年慶祝收穫節

examples.sentence: The city holds a [festival] in the summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座城市在夏天舉辦節慶

meanings.meaning_en_US: A series of connected vehicles traveling on railways.

examples.sentence: The [train] arrived on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 火車準時到達。

examples.sentence: We took the [train] to the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們搭火車去城市。

examples.sentence: There are many [trains] at the station.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 車站有很多火車。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having no moisture; not wet.

examples.sentence: The laundry is still [dry].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 衣物還是乾的。

examples.sentence: He prefers [dry] wines.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡乾型葡萄酒。

examples.sentence: The climate here is very [dry].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這裡的氣候非常乾燥。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To expel air through the mouth with force.

examples.sentence: Please [blow] out the candles on the cake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把蛋糕上的蠟燭吹熄。

examples.sentence: She can [blow] bubbles with gum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她能用口香糖吹泡泡。

examples.sentence: The wind began to [blow] harder.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風開始變得更大。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To talk or articulate sounds verbally.

examples.sentence: I can [speak] three languages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會說三種語言。

examples.sentence: Please [speak] clearly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請說清楚。

examples.sentence: He won't [speak] until he is ready.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不會說話，直到他準備好了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A long, narrow strip of material used for binding or fastening.

examples.sentence: I need some [tape] to wrap the package.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要一些膠帶來包裝包裹

examples.sentence: He used [tape] to fix the broken toy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用膠帶修理壞掉的玩具

examples.sentence: Can you hand me the [tape]?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以把膠帶遞給我嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A monetary unit of currency equal to one hundredth of a dollar.

examples.sentence: I found a [cent] on the sidewalk.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在在人行道上找到了1分錢。

examples.sentence: The cost is five [cents].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 費用是五分錢。

examples.sentence: He donated one hundred [cents] to charity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他向慈善機構捐了一百分。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To engage in physical combat or struggle.

examples.sentence: They began to [fight] over the last piece of cake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們開始為最後一塊蛋糕打鬥。

examples.sentence: The boxers will [fight] in the championship match.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 拳擊手將在冠軍賽中比賽。

examples.sentence: It is not right to [fight] with your friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 和朋友打鬥是不對的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A set of rooms forming an individual residence, typically within a larger building.

examples.sentence: She lives in a small [apartment] in the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她住在市裡的一個小公寓。

examples.sentence: They are looking to rent an [apartment] for the summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們想在夏天租一個公寓。

examples.sentence: The [apartment] has a beautiful view of the park.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那間公寓的窗外景色很美，可以看到公園。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The measurement of someone or something from bottom to top.

examples.sentence: The height of the building is impressive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這棟建築的高度令人印象深刻

examples.sentence: She reached a height of six feet.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的身高達到了六英尺

examples.sentence: The height of the mountain is daunting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座山的高度讓人望而生畏

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move or cause to move in a circular direction.

examples.sentence: Please [roll] the ball to me.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把球滾給我

examples.sentence: He tried to [roll] the dice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試著擲骰子

examples.sentence: The car began to [roll] down the hill.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 汽車開始沿著山坡滾下

meanings.meaning_en_US: A washing or soaking of the body in water.

examples.sentence: She took a long [bath] to relax.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她洗了個長長的澡來放鬆。

examples.sentence: A hot [bath] can soothe sore muscles.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 熱水澡可以舒緩酸痛的肌肉。

examples.sentence: He likes to read in the [bath].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡在浴缸裡看書。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A building or outdoor area where plays, movies, or other performances are presented.

examples.sentence: They went to the [theater] to watch a movie.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們去劇院看了一部電影。

examples.sentence: The [theater] was packed with excited audience members.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 劇院裡塞滿了興奮的觀眾。

examples.sentence: She has always wanted to perform on a [theater] stage.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她一直想在劇院舞台上表演。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In good health; free from disease.

examples.sentence: Eating fruits is a [healthy] choice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 吃水果是一個健康的選擇

examples.sentence: She feels [healthy] after exercising.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 運動後她感覺很健康

examples.sentence: A [healthy] diet is important for well-being.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 健康的飲食對於身心健康很重要

meanings.meaning_en_US: A professional who practices law.

examples.sentence: She hired a [lawyer] for the case.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為這個案子聘請了一位律師

examples.sentence: The [lawyer] advised him on his rights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 律師向他提供了有關他權利的建議

examples.sentence: Becoming a [lawyer] requires years of study.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 成為律師需要多年學習
